meta.label: Image classification
meta.author: Dataiku Labs
meta.description: Use this recipe to score (classify) a set of images contained in a folder. This recipe takes as input a folder of images and a folder containing a pre-trained model. It ouputs the labels for each image, as scored by the model.

inputRoles.name: image_folder
inputRoles.label: Image folder
inputRoles.description: The folder containing the images to be scored.

inputRoles.name: model_folder
inputRoles.label: Model folder
inputRoles.description: The folder containing the model and optionally the class index names.

outputRoles.name: scored_dataset
outputRoles.label: Output dataset
outputRoles.description: The dataset containing the classified images.
